name: currency-exchange-dashboard
description: Currency exchange dashboard with admin panel and social media integration

scripts.railway:build: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.railway:start: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.clean:win:
if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && if exist client
ode_modules rmdir /s /q client
ode_modules && if exist server
ode_modules rmdir /s /q server
ode_modules && if exist client\package-lock.json del client\package-lock.json && if exist server\package-lock.json del server\package-lock.json && if exist package-lock.json del package-lock.json
